mapper.select: -- 주문내역 상세정보 시 결제정보 조회 select s.ord_amt as order_amount, s.dlvr_chrg_amt as delivery_charge_amount, s.pay_amt as payment_amount, p.pym_dt as payment_date, t.trsctn_id as transaction_id, p.pay_meth as payment_method_code, p.pay_meth as payment_method_name, s.pay_stus as payment_status_code, s.pay_stus as payment_status_name, s.cnc_dt as cancel_date, if(s.cnc_rsn_cd = 'C99', s.cnc_rsn, cd.intg_cd_val_nm) as cancel_reason from ord_pay_info p inner join ord_prnr_info s on p.ord_no = s.ord_no and s.prnr_cd = #{partnerCode} left join ord_trsctn_info t on p.ord_no = t.ord_no left join com_intg_cd_dtl cd on s.cnc_rsn_cd = cd.intg_cd_val and cd.intg_cd_id = '000074' where p.ord_no = #{orderNo}
mapper.update: -- 주문 취소요청 update ord_prnr_info set ord_stus = 'O06', -- 취소요청 코드 upd_usr_id = #{userId}, upd_dt = now() where ord_no = #{orderNo}

-- 취소 요청 후 환불 정보에 대한 수정으로 -- 불필요 한 수정자, 수정일시는 제외(로직 변경 시 해당부분 추가할 것) update ord_pay_info set bank_cd = #{refundBankCode}, bank_acnt_no = #{refundBankAccountNo}, dpstr_nm = #{refundDepositorName} where ord_no = #{orderNo}
